item.title: Slack is introducing threaded messaging later this year
item.description:
Slack is introducing threaded messaging later this year

Workplace messaging startup Slack is close to cracking one of its most wanted features: threaded messaging. In conversation with The Verge's Walt Mossberg, Slack CEO Stewart Butterfield said the company has been prototyping various forms of threaded messaging internally for months in search of a solution that doesn't add too much clutter to the product's fast and free flow.

item.title: Why is the web trying to bring back a technology we left behind in the 6th century? | Declara
item.description:
Why is the web trying to bring back a technology we left behind in the 6th century? | Declara

Learn about Why is the web trying to bring back a technology we left behind in the 6th century?. Declara makes it easy to discover, share and organize knowledge. We empower individuals, organizations and countries to develop the knowledge needed to solve big problems.
